subject: Investing
title: Decentralized Exchanges vs. Centralized
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Decentralized Exchanges vs. Centralized.

hook.text: When FTX collapsed, users lost billions locked on the exchange. DEX users kept custody of their own funds.

buildup.text: Centralized exchanges (CEXs) hold your crypto for you. DEXs let you trade directly from your wallet.

discovery.text: DEXs use automated market makersâ€”algorithms that set prices based on supply and demand in liquidity pools.

twist.text: CEXs offer better speed and UX. DEXs offer self-custody and censorship resistance. Both have trade-offs.

climax.text: Many experienced traders use CEXs for speed and DEXs for assets not listed on centralized platforms.

punchline.text: Not your keys, not your coins. CEX or DEXâ€”know the custody trade-off.

quiz.question: What is the main advantage of a decentralized exchange?
options: Users keep custody of their funds
